channel.title: Hosts on Tech Tales and Fails
channel.description: Recent content in Hosts on Tech Tales and Fails

item.title: Craig
item.description: Craig brings data and automation together. He loves to learn and share what he learns with the technical community. He enjoys running and lives for his family. He/Him

item.title: Rob
item.description: Rob was a SQL Server DBA with a passion for PowerShell, Azure, Automation, and SQL (PaaS geddit?). Now he just helps people make things. He is a Data Platform MVP and an Azure MVP, a PowerShell Conference Europe organiser, and maintainer of many open-source projects. He has spoken at and volunteered at many Data and PowerShell events all over the world. He is a proud supporter of the Data and PowerShell communities.
